channel.title: News 📰 on Parker Addison
channel.description: Recent content in News 📰 on Parker Addison

item.title: First
item.description: Began data pipelining work for the AR-NOC team at Nautilus. The NSF wants us to create a no-setup-required virtual environment for VR and AR data visualization.

item.title: Textbook
item.description: Officially started working on the new introductory data science textbook, “Dive into Data Science”
